summary: Frontend testing complete for redesigned Solutions page. All features working correctly: hero section, 3 tabs (Signature Programs, Strategic Partnerships, Diagnostic Audit) with animated transitions, process timeline cards, gradient backgrounds, CTA buttons linking to JotForm, and final CTA section. Text visibility is good with no blue text on black backgrounds. Mobile responsive design verified.
passed_tests: Solutions page loads correctly without errors
Hero section displays with badges, title, stats, and decorative image
Signature Programs tab displays correctly with section header
Program cards show Problem/Outcome with gradient backgrounds
Who This Is For section displays with checkmark items
Process timeline displays 4 numbered phase cards with weeks indicator
Deliverables, Timeline, and Expected ROI grid renders correctly
Request Consultation CTA buttons link to JotForm
Strategic Partnerships tab switches correctly with animation
RECOMMENDED FOR ENTERPRISE badge visible on executive partnership
Partnership cards show Monthly, Quarterly, Annual, Premium sections
Dark/light card variations work correctly in Partnerships
Discuss Partnership CTA links to JotForm
Diagnostic Audit tab switches correctly with animation
Strategic Blindspot Audit header and problem statement display
Numbered steps (Pre-Work, Intensive Session, Post-Session Deliverables) visible
Technology Access section with dark background renders properly
Value Proposition and Why This Matters CTA sections display
Request Your Strategic Audit CTA links to JotForm
Final CTA section at bottom renders with dark gradient background
Schedule a Consultation button links to JotForm
Contact email (erania@brackett.agency) visible in final section
All text properly visible - no blue text on black backgrounds
Hover effects work on cards and interactive elements
Tab navigation works with animated transitions between tabs
Mobile responsive design works correctly
7 JotForm CTA links all point to correct URL
context_for_next_testing_agent: Solutions page redesign verified. All 3 tabs work correctly with animated transitions: Signature Programs (3 programs with process timelines), Strategic Partnerships (Executive and Growth tiers with enterprise badge), Diagnostic Audit (4-step process with dramatic CTA). All 7 CTA buttons link to JotForm (https://form.jotform.com/252728460666061). Design uses black (#0A0A0A) and gold (#C9A961) theme consistently. Mobile responsive design confirmed working. No console errors or visual issues found.
